maxims.challenge: The trick is to listen to the space between the sounds.

maxims.maxim: You are the infinite space, embracing and transcending all.
maxims.challenge: Catch a glimpse of the invisible world hidden in and beyond everything. Allow your vision to blur as you stare at these words, and see the white space in and around all the black letters before you.

maxims.maxim: This body, this mind, is not who you are. Who are you?
maxims.challenge: Watch your breath as it comes in...watch your breath as it flows out. Feel the deep rhythm of your heart as it pulses, throbbing with life. Listen to the sounds all around you. All this - you see it, you feel it...so how could it be you?
